/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. A white truck and a red car add splashes of color to the scene, hinting at the city's vibrant life. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
